Articles.Content: **UPDATE: THIS MOD IS NOW PART OF THE FARLO PLANET PACK:** http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/127654-wipkopernicus-farlo-planetary-pack-dev-thread/ This is an addon I made for KopernicusTech!It adds three new dwarfs and an ice giant!ALL of the planets rotate INCREDIBLY slow,so easy landing. Note-Due to some free time,the update will come fairly soon!Planned: -Science Blurbs -Distant Object Enhancement Compatibility -Biome update -Tidal locking fix So look forward to it! **QUARZEN** *The first Dwarf Planet found,it is a rocky planet that orbits between Kerbin and Eve.* *This planet is often forgotten in most orbital maps due to lazy employees.* **ZEROM** *This dwarf planet orbits just before Jool.For many years,the planet was mistaken for* *a moon of Jool,but we soon noticed it was in a completely different orbit.* **NEER** *This is the farthest of the three dwarfs,and possibly the most ironically named thing* *in the Kerbol System.We have since fired the prankster who decided to name this.* *Solar power is pretty much useless out here.* KEVO *Kevo is the only moon of Neer.It's existence was kept secret for four years,for we thought we were getting transmissions.* *Turns out our radio was broken.* **SYPHAR** *This is an ice giant we found near Jool.It has a moon,which many believed to be a virus* *affecting the screen before the Customer Service Hotline reminded them that they were looking through* *a telescope,not a computer screen.* FERA *Fera is the only moon of Syphar.It's thought that there were many moons of Syphar before an unknown* *anomaly left only one.Don't think about this too much though,or you'll hurt your head.* > > [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/FEtPD) To do(Contributions are appreciated as I am usually very busy): - Science Blurbs - EVE/AVP Support - DOE Support - Biome Testing - Speed up the planet rotation. Source:[https://github.com/Vexxus9999/ForgottenWorlds](https://github.com/Vexxus9999/ForgottenWorlds) Licence:[http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0) KopernicusLicence:[GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0-standalone.html). KittopiaSpaceLicence:[GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0-standalone.html). **Edited May 7, 2021 by Snark** Link to defunct website removed by moderator
Awesome, The planets' descriptions are very much like those of the planets in the stock game.

> very much like those of the planets in the stock game.

Yeah,I was going for that.

Hi Vexxus9999,

I've removed the download link until you are able to bring it into compliance with the [thread=87841]Add-on Posting Rules[/thread]. Specifically, you need to add licenses for this mod as well as both mods you redistribute to the OP as well as the download. You'll also need to provide the source Ã¢â‚¬â€œ you can solve that by link to the plugin threads, assuming they provide source. At least one of those mods requires attribution, and it's generally a good idea to provide credits even if it's not required.
If you have added the license then you can re-add the download.

> You'll also need to provide the source Ã¢â‚¬â€œ you can solve that by link to the plugin threads, assuming they provide source.

Added the source code.

Nicely done! Looking forward to landing on some of these planets. I like the orbits. Looking forward to your next update. Maybe you could add a planet with an atmosphere.
